mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_number, goods_name, goods_price, goods_count)values(#{goodsNumber}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsCount})
mapper.update: update goods set goods_name=#{goodsName}, goods_price=#{goodsPrice}, goods_count=#{goodsCount} where goods_number = #{goodsNumber}
mapper.select: select * from goods where goods_name like #{goodsName}
mapper.update: update goods set goods_count=goods_count-#{goodsCount} where goods_number = #{goodsNumber}
